* Represents a custom exception specific to Dude.
* Abstract class that serves as the base class for all Dude-specific exceptions.
public abstract class DudeException extends Exception {
* Constructs a new DudeException with the specified detail message.
* @param message The detail message explaining the reason for the exception.
* Thrown to indicate that an invalid argument for specific command is provided in the input.
* Constructs a DudeInvalidArgumentException with detailed message
* explaining that an invalid argument was provided for the specified command.
* @param command  The name of the command that received the invalid argument.
* @param error    The invalid argument that was provided.
* @param expected The expected format for the argument.
public DudeInvalidArgumentException(String command, String error, String expected) {
super("\"" + error + "\" is not a valid format for \"" + command + "\", please use \"" + expected + "\".");
* Thrown to indicate that an invalid command is provided in the input.
* Constructs a DudeInvalidCommandException with no detail message.
super("I don't know what does that mean.");
* Thrown to indicate that an invalid shortcut define is provided in the input.
* Constructs a DudeInvalidDefineException with no detail message to indicate
* that user attempts to define a pre-defined command as shortcut.
super("You can't define a command as shortcut.");
* Constructs a DudeInvalidDefineException with detail message to indicate
* that user attempts to define shortcut for a not existing command.
* @param command The command that was attempted to be mapped to.
super("\"" + command + "\" is not a valid command.");
* Thrown to indicate that no command is provided in the input.
* Constructs a DudeNullCommandException with no detail message.
* Thrown to indicate that no date and time is provided in the input for specific command.
* Constructs a new DudeNullDateTimeException with a detailed message
* indicating that a date and time are required for the specified command.
* @param command The name of the command that requires a date and time.
super("You need to add date and time for \"" + command + "\".");
* Thrown to indicate that no command description is provided in the input.
* Constructs a new DudeNullDescriptionException with a detailed message
* indicating that a description is required for the specified command.
* @param command The name of the command that requires a description.
super("You need to add description(s) for \"" + command + "\".");
* Thrown to indicate that a required numerical input is not a valid number.
* Constructs a new DudeNumberException with a detailed message
* indicating that the provided input is not a valid number.
* @param input The input string that could not be parsed as a number.
super("\"" + input + "\" is not a valid number.");
* Thrown to indicate that a shortcut deletion was invalid.
* Constructs a DudeShortcutDeleteException with no detailed message to indicate
* that user attempts to delete a pre-defined command.
super("You can't delete a command type.");
* Constructs a DudeShortcutDeleteException with detailed message to indicate
* that user attempts to delete a not-existing shortcut.
* @param shortcut The shortcut that was attempted to be deleted.
super("\"" + shortcut + "\" is not defined as a valid shortcut yet.");
* Thrown to indicate that no task with matching prompt is found in TaskList.
* Constructs a DudeTaskNotFoundException with no detail message.
super("No matching task found in your task list.");
